## EthersConnectionOptionalParams.useStore property

Create a [SfStablecoinStore](./stablecoin-lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.md) and expose it as the `store` property.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly useStore?: EthersSfStablecoinStoreOption;
```

## Remarks

When set to one of the available [options](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoinstoreoption.md)<!-- -->, [ReadableEthers.connect()](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.readableethers.connect_1.md) will return a [ReadableEthersWithStore](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.readableetherswithstore.md)<!-- -->, while [EthersSfStablecoin.connect()](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoin.connect_1.md) will return an [EthersSfStablecoinWithStore](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoinwithstore.md)<!-- -->.

Note that the store won't start monitoring the blockchain until its [start()](./stablecoin-lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.start.md) function is called.
